name: Veterinarian Story
description:
A short story where a veterinarian reflects on the realities of the animals that go through the clinic... and the ones that don't.

The game was made in 12 days for the Antispeciesism Jam (https://itch.io/jam/antispeciesism)

Credits:

-Original Idea and 2D Art by HerbivoreCore

-Writing by LaAdelita (https://laadelita.itch.io/) 

-Programming by Angelonit (https://angelonit.itch.io/)
